# http://llms-text.ai llms.txt

- [LLM Data Explorer](https://llms-text.ai/): Explore extensive LLM data entries for various domains.
- [LLMS.txt Legal Information](https://llms-text.ai/legal): Explore legal terms and privacy policies for LLMS.txt Explorer.
- [LLMS Text Project](https://llms-text.ai/about): Tools and resources for standardizing interactions with AI models.
- [LLM Search API](https://llms-text.ai/api): Documentation for LLM search API usage and parameters.
- [LLMs and AI Blog](https://llms-text.ai/blog): Explore articles on LLMs, AI development, and web standards.
- [Request or Report Site](https://llms-text.ai/request): Request new sites or report existing ones on GitHub.
- [New Web Standard](https://llms-text.ai/blog/a-new-web-standard): New web standard for LLMs to process content efficiently.
- [LLMS Explorer Sitemap](https://llms-text.ai/sitemap.xml): Explore the sitemap for LLMS Explorer's latest updates.
- [Utilizing llms.txt Files](https://llms-text.ai/blog/how-llmstxt-are-used): Explore how llms.txt files optimize AI content understanding.
- [LLMs Blog Articles](https://llms-text.ai/blog?tag=llms): Explore articles on LLMs, AI development, and web standards.
